testsuite.class: STEP_UTILITYFUNCTIONS - Bash Step Tests For Utility Function
Below test cases are for run state

testcase.class: STEP_UTILITYFUNCTIONS - Bash Step Tests For Utility Function Below test cases are for run state S-Bash-util-0001. User adds a variable using add_run_variables utility function in the Bash step for one key-value pair and the value should be of type string with spaces included. Then verifies that the format of the string should be the same in the onExecute section.
testcase.classclass: S-Bash-util-0001. User adds a variable using add_run_variables utility function in the Bash step for one key-value pair and the value should be of type string with spaces included. Then verifies that the format of the string should be the same in the onExecute section.

testcase.class: STEP_UTILITYFUNCTIONS - Bash Step Tests For Utility Function Below test cases are for run state S-Bash-util-0004. User adds a variable using add_run_variables utility function in the Bash step for one key-value pair where the value is of string with spaces and if the variable is exported in powerShell step . Then verifies that the format of the string should be the same in the onExecute section.
testcase.classclass: S-Bash-util-0004. User adds a variable using add_run_variables utility function in the Bash step for one key-value pair where the value is of string with spaces and if the variable is exported in powerShell step . Then verifies that the format of the string should be the same in the onExecute section.

testcase.class: STEP_UTILITYFUNCTIONS - Bash Step Tests For Utility Function Below test cases are for run state S-Bash-util-0005. User adds a variable using add_run_files utility function in the bash step and if the file is exported in powershell step. Then verify if the file is in the same format.
testcase.classclass: S-Bash-util-0005. User adds a variable using add_run_files utility function in the bash step and if the file is exported in powershell step. Then verify if the file is in the same format.

testcase.class: STEP_UTILITYFUNCTIONS - Bash Step Tests For Utility Function Below test cases are for run state S-Bash-util-0013. Add add_run_variables utility function in the Bash step where step1 adds var1 & var2 run variables, step2 adds var3 variable and modifies the var2, step3 then consumes all var1, var2 & var3.
testcase.classclass: S-Bash-util-0013. Add add_run_variables utility function in the Bash step where step1 adds var1 & var2 run variables, step2 adds var3 variable and modifies the var2, step3 then consumes all var1, var2 & var3.

testcase.class: STEP_UTILITYFUNCTIONS - Bash Step Tests For Utility Function Below test cases are for run state S-Bash-util-0014. Add add_run_variables utility function in the Bash step where step1 runs both step2 and step3. step2 adds var1 & step3 adds var2 run variables, step4 then consumes both var1 & var2
testcase.classclass: S-Bash-util-0014. Add add_run_variables utility function in the Bash step where step1 runs both step2 and step3. step2 adds var1 & step3 adds var2 run variables, step4 then consumes both var1 & var2
